acceptance_criteria: UAT for new customer business is supported by oPOM2 team, i.e. some bug fixing is performed by oPOM2
Production support can be handled by oPOM2 team for new customer business. Prerequisite: DEV-team can access PROD

Documentation of MAPI-mediator has been created in WIKI
oPOM2 demos order decomposition in sprint review on local machines
Refinement for change order decomposition user stories done by oPOM2 team
